Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District Prop. No. 1 -- 22.15 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bogalusa School District Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Property Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of twenty-two and fifteen hundredths (22.15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,810,297 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of giving additional support for constructing, maintaining, operating and improving the public elementary and secondary schools in the District, said millage to represent a nine hundredths of a mill (.09) increase over the 22.06 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on March 8, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District Prop. No. 2 -- 3.12 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bogalusa School District Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Property Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of three and twelve hundredths (3.12) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $254,995 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating schools located in said District, said millage to represent a one hundredths of a mill (.01) increase over the 3.11 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on March 8, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District Prop. No. 3 -- 7.79 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bogalusa School District Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Property Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the ''District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of seven and seventy-nine hundredths (7.79) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $636,669 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, as a special tax leeway for maintenance, said millage to represent a three hundredths of a mill (.03) increase over the 7.76 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on March 8, 2008?
